mapper.select: select m.me_no, m.me_writer, (select e_name from EMPLOYEE where m.ME_WRITER = E_NO) as writer_name, mr.read_status, m.me_title, m.me_content, to_char(m.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') as reg_date, mf.ME_FILE_NO, mf.ME_FILENAME from MESSAGE m join MESSAGE_RECIPIENT mr on m.me_no = mr.me_no left join MESSAGE_FILE mf on mf.me_no = m.me_no where mr.r_id = #{e_no} and mr.me_status = 'Y' order by m.me_no desc
